About

AktÃ¼el IT is a privately held information technology management and consulting firm that specializes in developing, implementing and maintaining software applications and custom solutions for institutions of higher learning.

Our Mission Our mission is to provide value-based services that enhance and improve information systems, and to develop and implement strategies for integrating campus-wide technology solutions for our clients.

We Are Innovative & Progressive AktÃ¼el IT is recognized as an innovative and progressive leader in the implementation, analysis and support of PeopleSoft Campus Solutions. We are an Oracle Partner and a select member of Oracle’s PeopleSoft Enterprise Product Focus Area.

Over the past ten years our Principal Consulting Team has dedicated itself to creating and fine-tuning industry leading development and delivery strategies specifically tailored for implementing and customizing the software product.

AktÃ¼el’s proven strategies give clients a distinct advantage in identifying potential problems, implementing creative solutions and eliminating obstacles throughout the lifecycle of implementation.

Our breadth of knowledge and mastery of the software provide a solid foundation that administration, faculty, staff and students can depend on to deliver a professional and successful implementation.
